list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part or aspect of something abstract, especially one that is essential or characteristic.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the death had all the elements of a great tabloid story
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cái chết có tất cả các yếu tố của một câu chuyện tuyệt vời với một tờ báo lá cải

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of more than one hundred substances that cannot be chemically interconverted or broken down into simpler substances and are primary constituents of matter. Each element is distinguished by its atomic number, i.e. the number of protons in the nuclei of its atoms.
the weather, especially strong winds, heavy rain, and other kinds of bad weather.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was no barrier against the elements
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không có rào cản chống lại các yếu tố

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part in an electric teapot, heater, or stove that contains a wire through which an electric current is passed to provide heat.
